definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces

sentences.english: Brazilian defender Emilson Cribari says he's settled at Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 巴西后卫克里巴里说他会留在拉齐奥。

sentences.english: He can play centre-back or either full-back.
sentences.chinese: 他可以打中后卫和任何一个位置的边路后卫。

sentences.english: He can play centre-back or either full-back.
sentences.chinese: 他可以打中后卫和任何一个位置的边路后卫。

sentences.english: The inside left is passing the opposing side's fullback line.
sentences.chinese: 这左辅正越过对方的后卫线。

sentences.english: The Chicago Bull bought a new guard.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥公牛队新雇了一名后卫。

sentences.english: Real Madrid defender Gabriel Heinze has conceded he would be interested in playing Premier League football again.
sentences.chinese: 皇马后卫海因策已经承认他可以再次享受英超足球。

sentences.english: The two players will rest for 3-4 days undergoing physiotherapy for their contusions.
sentences.chinese: 这两名后卫球员将休息3到4天并接受物理治疗。

sentences.english: We have really good competition now on the left with Insua, Aurelio and Dossena.
sentences.chinese: 我们左后卫的竞争很惨烈，小因，饼子和牛哥。

sentences.english: The signing has been completed of Dutch international defender Khalid Boulahrouz.
sentences.chinese: 蓝军完成和荷兰国脚后卫博拉鲁兹的签约仪式。

sentences.english: He is a quieter point guard than Li.
sentences.chinese: 他跟李光相比是一个更稳定的后卫。

sentences.english: The Lakers have former MVP Kobe Bryant pairing with Fisher in their starting back-court.
sentences.chinese: 湖人的后卫阵容有前MVP科比和费舍尔的配对。

sentences.english: I don't see many other world class left-backs available.
sentences.chinese: 我想不到比他更适合这个位置的世界级左后卫人选。

sentences.english: Head, a fourth-year point guard, can be a free agent after this season.
sentences.chinese: 海德，四年级后卫，这赛季以后成为自由球员。

sentences.english: The toast of the Chinese team was defender Liu Ailing.
sentences.chinese: 这次比赛的功臣是后卫刘爱玲。

sentences.english: Right-back Jerez also has problems with his thigh after recovering from tendon inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 右后卫赫雷斯在肌腱发炎恢复后，大腿仍有一些问题。

definition: middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
Zhongwei prefecture level city in Ningxia
(in classical literature) young military officer of high rank for his age/(during the Cultural Revolution) young militant in the Red Guard/(in modern usage) rising star (in sport, politics etc)
